titles.title: HP2 Begin, my tongue, some heavenly theme

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Begin my tongue, some heavenly theme;
Awake, my voice, and sing
The mighty works, or mightier name,
Of our eternal King.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Tell of his wondrous faithfulness,
And sound his power abroad;
Sing the sweet promise of his grace.
The quickening word of God.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Engraved as in eternal brass.
The mighty promise of his grace,
Nor can the powers of darkness raise
Those everlasting lines.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
His every word of grace is strong,
As that which built the skies,
The voice that rolls the stars along
Speaks all the promises.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Now shall my leaping heart rejoice
To know thy favour sure:
I trust the all-creating voice,
And faith desires no more.
